ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c, "BCBST"), Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "BCBST Medicare Advantage", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "BCBST CSNP", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "BCBST DSNP", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "BCBST FIDE", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Call Request", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Screener" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Group/Plan Sponsor must be BCBST Medicare Advantage, BCBST CSNP, BCBST DSNP, or BCBST FIDE
